Name: Black Cocktail
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Crème de Mûre liqueur
22.5 ml Chilled water reduce if wet ice
Instructions: MUDDLE berries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: The Pernod & Black of the 1980s revisited. Anis liqueur enhances the rich, tart flavours of blackberry.
History: Created in 2003 by yours truly, London, England.
